text: it’s indeed an end goal, but it’s still years out.
You will have to use the api to get all feedback form submissions
but you'll be able to display them on your crm card

Can I use the CRM card to call POST method, Carter?
Because the document said that the API call default is GET.
Well you'll need to setup a server or serverless function to handle the request from the crm card and then this function will call the submissions endpoint and respond back with the info for the card
I can walk you through the process if you need help with it, just grab some time on my calendar (link is in my bio)

Thank you, Carter.
Your help is enough for me.
I need to research the serverless functionality first.
I will ask for help if anything is unclear.
